name: ColorRGB2HSV

description.en: Converts the input value from RGB colorspace to HSV.
description.zh: 将输入值从RGB色彩空间转换到HSV色彩空间。

main: vec4 P = mix(vec4(Color.bg, K.wz), vec4(Color.gb, K.xy), step(Color.b, Color.g));
vec4 Q = mix(vec4(P.xyw, Color.r), vec4(Color.r, P.yzx), step(P.x, Color.r));
return vec4(abs(Q.z + (Q.w - Q.y) / (6.0 * D + E)), D / (Q.x + E), Q.x, Color.a);
